topic.title: Readers
topic.section:
Readers can register to read the conference proceedings, whether immediately open access or open after a period of time after initial publication. Registered Readers will receive a notification email of the papers published for the conference, and will be able to receive other email sent by the Director or Conference Manager.

New users can enroll themselves as a Reader on registration to a scheduled conference, and can enroll themselves with other scheduled conferences from their profile page.
